turns.content: GDMI 600x600 ZM in hospital lab ATEX 22.

For the hospital lab application, you've selected a GDMI-600x600 housing with ZM (Zinc-Magnesium) material.This housing has a C4 corrosion class. For hospital environments with hygiene requirements, VDI 6022 recommends C5 corrosion resistance, which ZM provides.The lab environment also presents a risk of Explosive Atmosphere. To prevent ignition sources in ATEX Zone 22, all components must be grounded to prevent static discharge. This requires grounding all metallic housing components and using anti-static filter media.To finalize the configuration, I need two details:
